html:
{%- for row in doc.current_education-%} {%- endfor -%}
DIPLOMA-{{ row.programs}}
Name of the Student {{doc.title}} {% if doc.image !=None %}
{{doc.roll_no}}
{% else %}
{{doc.roll_no}}
{% endif %}
College Roll No {{doc.get_formatted("roll_no")}}
Date of Admission {{doc.get_formatted("joining_date")}}
Sex {{doc.get_formatted("gender")}}
Category {{doc.get_formatted("student_categorys")}}
{%- for row in doc.education_details -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for row in doc.education_details -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for row in doc.education_details -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- for row in doc.education_details -%} {%- endfor -%}
Father's/Guardian's Name {{doc.get_formatted("fathers_name")}}
Occupation {{doc.get_formatted("fathers_occupation")}}
Mother's Name {{doc.get_formatted("mothers_name")}}
Religion {{doc.get_formatted("religion")}}
Address for Correspondence {{doc.get_formatted("address_for_correspondences")}}
DOB in figures {{doc.get_formatted("date_of_birth")}}
DOB in words {{doc.get_formatted("dob_in_words")}}
Permanent Address {{doc.get_formatted("address_line_1")}} {{doc.get_formatted("address_line_2")}} {{doc.get_formatted("city")}} {{doc.get_formatted("district")}} {{doc.get_formatted("block")}} {{doc.get_formatted("at_post")}} {{doc.get_formatted("state")}} {{doc.get_formatted("pin_code")}}
Emergency Phone No {{doc.get_formatted("fathers_contact_number")}} {{doc.get_formatted("local_guardian_contact_no")}}
Last Exam Passed{{row.get_formatted("qualification")}}
Name and Address of the College From which CLC submitted Name of Board{{row.get_formatted("institute")}} {{row.get_formatted("board")}}
Qualifying Exam Passed{{row.get_formatted("qualification")}}
Year of Passing{{row.get_formatted("year_of_completion")}}
Admission test with Rank
Council Reg No {{doc.get_formatted("sams_portal_id")}}({{doc.get_formatted("name")}})
Date of Issue of CLC
name: Print Format for Admission Register
